brainly_data.question: The civil war devastated which side of the economy ?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: The civil war devastated which side of the economy ?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Together with other states in the South, North Carolina was devastated by the Civil War
